title: By the King, a proclamation for disarming and securing of popish recusants
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: Printed by John Bill, Christopher Barker, Thomas Newcomb and Henry Hills ...,
notes: "Given at our court at Whitehall, the twentieth day of December, 1678, in the thirtieth year of our reign."
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
